title: League of legends not opening?
body:
I got the new client last night, and now it wont open when i click on it
i deleted the icon from my desktop then re-installed league, that might be what caused it, any way to fix it?

replies.body: Are you getting any errors when opening the patcher?  I first suggest a restart in case it may have crashed in the background.  Your settings may have also changed with the new data, so you may need to configure your pc to allow access.  This can best be done through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
